articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Guild
Good chance to join Developer DAO for free..
JokeDAO is actually serious, and it is a new form of collective decision-making that you should try out!
All you have to do is to write an application to Developer DAO and participate in the contest.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Developer DAO's first @jokedao_ contest is now underway! 🃏🃏🃏
Want to join Developer DAO for free - Pitch yourself here:

DAO members will then use their airdropped tokens to vote on the three winners. ✨
RT for reach. This isn't a joke.
 https://www.jokedao.io/contest/polygon/0xd5Fe5f308A7F937CECB8A152eb5D19C6aC37a6aB

articles.description:
RT cami ᵍᵐ
Giving a talk next week in front of the GraphQL/Apollo community to showcase how GraphQL is being used in blockchain development to build fully decentralized applications with @graphprotocol 😍
Apollo: In this #GraphQLSummit session: @camiinthisthang will explain how GraphQL is used in the #web3 technology stack to build APIs that make #blockchain data easily accessible to developers. Register here:
 https://bit.ly/3Bl5e13

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Finally the news is out 💫 Keep pushing notifications!
Push Protocol | Previously EPNS: Dear EPNS community, friends, & builders 🔔
Today we have an exciting announcement. EPNS is rebranding to Push Protocol!
The announcement is the first step towards a multi-chain communication future —  allowing Push Protocol to be the communication platform of web3.
(1/10)
articles.title: Finally the news is out 💫 Keep pushing notifications!
